column1: The Roman Catholic Diocese of São Luís de Montes Belos (Latin: Dioecesis Sancti Aloisii de Montes Belos) is a diocese centred on the city of São Luís de Montes Belos and part of the ecclesiastical province of Goiânia in Brazil.
It was established as the Territorial Prelature of São Luís de Montes Belos on 25 November 1961 with territory taken from the Metropolitan Archdiocese of Goiânia
column2: the Diocese of Goiás and the Diocese of Jataí
column3: and was entrusted to the Dutch members of the Passionist religious institute.It became the Diocese of São Luís de Montes Belos on 4 August 1981.
